page.title: 17SALMON FISHING IN BALMEDIE
page.content: Our group discovered that salmon fishing was becoming more difficult to make a living at. There is now a shortage of salmon in the sea off Balmedie. The size of fish caught is between 4lbs and 15lbs. The salmon are caught in two different kinds of net. The Stake net lies on the beach and fish swim into it themselves and become trapped in the maze of nets. The Drag net is pulled by a boat and the fish are trapped in the net. The fishermen also catch flat fish and sometimes catch mackeral. The Stake nets are about 36ft long 20ft wide and the area of the net is about 30 square yards. The salmon is sold to fish merchants, it is very expensive, it can cost Â£2 per pound.
